description: These scholarships are awarded to students who show excellence in their language studies. Eligibility Requirements Declared major/minor in French Minimum 3.0 GPA Club participation, leadership, involvement in outreach events, or plans for participation in a study tour Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
